page.title: 11Burford Cottage Hospital
page.content: The hospital in Burford is a Community Hospital which looks after people in Burford and the surrounding area.It was built in 1902 by the people of Burford. Every year about 8000 people visit the Casualty Unit and 3000 visit the Out Patients,400 people stay in the wards, 14000 people are visited by the District Nurse and 8000 by the Health Visitor.There are 12 beds in 4 wards. There are 5 Doctors,4 Nurses and 8 Care Assistants,1 cook,1 porterand 2 secretaries.They only perform small opertions.Most of the Patients are old pople and no children are admitted. People are allowed to visit patients 24 hours a day.There is a research unit for Nurses.Mr.Alan Pearson is the Senior Nursing Officer.
